name: Lost Amongst the Mist
description:
Introduction:

You are a scientist living along in the forest, you built a machine to keep the forest fog away from your house, but a fault in a formula when wrong and the machine, instead of expelling the fog, now devours the space around the fog too! Perhaps it better to name it Sapce Folder now.

The Space Folder has isolated your house from the rest of the world, folding it into the void bit by bit as time goes. You have six days to solve puzzles and revers the machine before falling into the misty void with your house.

This game is based on spacial anomaly, as you lose space and item to the machine, you may also use the void in your own favor if you think ahead.

Control:
WASD for move
LShift for sprint
Space for jump
E,R for interaction
P to call up menu and journal

Note// The porformance suffer sometimes when running on WebGL
